original_text: And when they had inflicted many blows upon them, they threw them into prison, ordering the jailer to keep them safely.
korean_text: 많이 친 후에 옥에 가두고 간수에게 명하여 든든히 지키라 하니

sentences.original_text: And when they had inflicted many blows upon them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들에게 여러 번 매를 쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: ordering the jailer to keep them safely
